channel.title: Mini-Game team for hire!
channel.description:
We're working on a mini-game, and we want your help!
The Lagex staff wants your help!
Our previous discussion..
[IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/eiqnox.gif[/img]Mod Mark: Yeah, I think we should add some mini-games. [IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/eiqnox.gif[/img]Mod Joe: But...We need a team... [IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/eiqnox.gif[/img]Mod Mark: I'll work on it with Rune Locus. [IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/eiqnox.gif[/img]Mod Joe: And I'll take Mopar... [IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/2mmes61.gif[/img]Ilikecheese: Yeah, I'll just wait here.... [IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/eiqnox.gif[/img]Mod Robin: I'll work on the ints for items right now. [IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/eiqnox.gif[/img]Mod Jed: I'll update the website...
As you can see, we're working on the basic preparations, but we need a team to start this project as it's big.
Applications...
[code] Name: Java exp: (1-10) Do you know C++?: [/code]
Then, if you're accepted, you'll receive a private message with instructions on what to do next.
[i]If you're going to criticize this post, please, just leave.[/i]
Thanks,
[IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/eiqnox.gif[/img]Lagex Staff

item.title: Mini-Game team for hire!
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

Name: Bill
Java exp: (1-10) 6 if you mean p servers, 2 if you mean the whole programming language
Do you know C++?: Nope
Id be glad to make a minigame for your server, but theres a few conditions
you trust me with your server
leave me with atleast a //credit in the minigame
i make it, but you tell me how you want it done
this is just doing you a favor, im not joining your coding team if you have 1 =P
ill probly only make 1 for you and hopefully youll use it to learn how to make mini games my way(makes least lag)
post reply :]

Read full topic

item.title: Mini-Game team for hire!
item.dc:creator: @Lagex Lagex
item.description:
@Lagex wrote:

We’re working on a mini-game, and we want your help!

The Lagex staff wants your help!

Our previous discussion…

Mod Mark: Yeah, I think we should add some mini-games.
Mod Joe: But…We need a team…
Mod Mark: I’ll work on it with Rune Locus.
Mod Joe: And I’ll take Mopar…
Ilikecheese: Yeah, I’ll just wait here…
Mod Robin: I’ll work on the ints for items right now.
Mod Jed: I’ll update the website…

As you can see, we’re working on the basic preparations, but we need a team to start this project as it’s big.

Applications…

Name:
Java exp: (1-10)
Do you know C++?:

Then, if you’re accepted, you’ll receive a private message with instructions on what to do next.

If you’re going to criticize this post, please, just leave.

Thanks,

Lagex Staff

Read full topic
